QuestData.Title: Huln's War - The Nathrezim
QuestData.Description:
I am fully occupied here organizing my troops and planning for the battle to come.
While I would like to slay the Dreadlord Tichondrius myself, I will allow that honor to be yours, Huln Highmountain.
QuestData.RewardText: You see now, that Huln was mighty? He united the tribes and defeated terribly powerful foes.
